basic_details.name: Samsung Galaxy Note10+
basic_details.stock_indicator_text:
GEMPAK SALE!
Get this device at a discounted price with any Celcom Mobile Plan! View our terms & conditions

more_details.shipping_details: 1.Delivery is within Malaysia only. 2.Orders placed before 12pm will be processed on the same day and for orders placed after 12pm will be processed on the next working day. The estimated delivery time are as follows:  a.Klang Valley within 1-2 working days  b.Peninsular Malaysia (except Klang Valley) within 2-3 working days   c.East Malaysia within 3-5 working days
more_details.whatInTheBox: Phone, Adapter, Micro USB Cable, Important Information Booklet with Warranty Card, Quick Guide, SIM Card Tool.
more_details.neptune_subsidy_message: Your selected supplementary line(s) will be tied to your Principal line and will be bound to the same contract. You are recommended to use the maximum amount of subsidy to enjoy the device at lowest price. Choose the subsidies you wish to utilise for this purchase.

plans.label: Delivery Locations
plans.desc:
1.Delivery is within Malaysia only.
2.Orders placed before 12pm will be processed on the same day and for orders placed after 12pm will be processed on the next working day. The estimated delivery time are as follows:
a.Klang Valley within 1-2 working days
b.Peninsular Malaysia (except Klang Valley) within 2-3 working days
c.East Malaysia within 3-5 working days

legal.label: Ownership
legal.desc:
1.Third party collection of the product is not allowed. The product will be deliver on buyer's name and to the address that is indicated in Customer order confirmation.
2.Customer are required to produce Customer NRIC, passport or any other identification document for verification of identity upon receiving the product, failing which the product will not be deliver to the Customer.

cancellation.label: Refund Policy
cancellation.desc:
1.Product not delivered after three (3) failed delivery attempt and will be returned to the courier agency headquarters. Customer must arrange for self-collection at the courier agency at the designated venue within 7 days or additional delivery fee may be imposed on the Customer if additional delivery is required.
2.All products not delivered, uncollected and unclaimed by the Customer after 7 days, will be deemed cancelled and terminated by Celcom Online Store and no refund will be given.
